definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He says he's a phrenologist, whatever that is.
sentences.chinese: 他说他是一位生物学家。

sentences.english: The appearance of the whale has stunned marine biologists.
sentences.chinese: 这头灰鲸的让海洋生物学家大为吃惊。

sentences.english: Li was a member of the American Society of Plant Biologists.
sentences.chinese: 黎是一个植物生物学家的美国社会的成员。

sentences.english: This discovery opens up new vistas of research for biologists.
sentences.chinese: 这一发明为生物学家展现了新的研讨远景。

sentences.english: Marine Studio biologists have pointed out that.
sentences.chinese: 海洋摄影室的生物学家指出。

sentences.english: This is a question that has interested biologists for a really long time, " says Sean Carroll, a UW-Madison molecular biologist and the senior author of the Nature report.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很长的时间让生物学家感兴趣的问题”。

sentences.english: This is a question that has interested biologists for a really long time," says Sean Carroll, a UW-Madison molecular biologist and the senior author of the Nature report.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很长的时间让生物学家感兴趣的问题”。

sentences.english: Schuster is one of the biologists who found the new species.
sentences.chinese: 舒斯特正是发现新物种的生物学家之一。

sentences.english: Biologists use the binomial system of nomenclature developed by Linnaeus to categorize the varieties of life on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 生物学家利用林奈发展的双名法对生物分类。

sentences.english: The biologist advanced a new theory of life.
sentences.chinese: 这位生物学家提出了一个有关生命的新学说。

sentences.english: Several biologists are collecting fine animal hair from many different places.
sentences.chinese: 生物学家四处收集这种动物的毳毛。

sentences.english: Dr Murnane is a biologist with particular experience in neuroscience and pharmacology.
sentences.chinese: 生物学家，拥有神经科学和药理学的丰富经验。

sentences.english: Count evolutionary biologist Jianzhi Zhang of the University of Michigan among the skeptical.
sentences.chinese: 美国密歇根大学进化生物学家张建志就是质疑者之一。

sentences.english: Again, a biologist cuts out an eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 一位生物学家再一次割除了一个鲸眼球。

sentences.english: Cell biologists often seem like modern-day alchemists.
sentences.chinese: 细胞生物学家就如当今时代的炼金术师。

sentences.english: Dr. Laland is an evolutionary biologist at the University of St. Andrews in Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 拉兰德博士是苏格兰圣安德鲁斯大学的进化生物学家。

pinyin: tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1
